snippet: As the beleaguered online brokerage firm continues to overhaul its business, it named Frank J. Petrilli, the board chairman, the interim leader, following the abrupt departure of Steven J. Freiberg.
abstract: As the beleaguered online brokerage firm continues to overhaul its business, it named Frank J. Petrilli, the board chairman, the interim leader, following the abrupt departure of Steven J. Freiberg.

headline.main: E*Trade Replaces C.E.O. Amid Turnaround Effort
headline.print_headline: E*Trade Ousts Its Chief Amid Turnaround Effort
